DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate acute chronic effect botanical supplement strength , muscle function , lean body mass Participants : The acute phase include 30 participant , chronic phase include 84 participant . All participant must healthy recreationally active male age 18 35 year . Procedures ( method ) : Acute phase : Participants complete three test visit part part cross-over design , strength muscle function assess prior follow consumption supplement . The experimental supplement blend botanical extract ; treatment arm include full dose ( FULL ; 350 mg capsule ) , half dose ( HALF ; 175 mg plus maltodextrin ) , placebo ( PLA ; maltodextrin ) . Chronic phase : Body composition , muscle cross-sectional area , complete blood count metabolic panel , subjective survey , strength measure prior follow 8-week supervised resistance training program , conjunction daily supplementation FULL , HALF , PLA .
DOC.brief_title: Botanical Supplement Muscle Function Lean Body Mass
DOC.criteria: Recreationally Active ( 1 4 hour exercise/ sport participation per week 1 hour resistance training exercise per week ) previous 12 week . BMI < 30 kg/mÂ² Have smoke past year . Participant provide write date informed consent participate study Participant willing able comply protocol Participant apparently healthy free disease , determine health history questionnaire Participant agree abstain caffeine , tobacco , alcohol , exercise within 24 hour test visit Participant use dietary supplement within 12 week prior enrollment begin supplementation study . Potential supplement include limited Betaalanine , Creatine , HMB , Carnosine , Taurine , androstenedione , DHEA , Whey protein , preworkout supplement . Participant gain lost 10 lb previous 2 month . Participant currently enrol separate clinical trial . Participant participate clinical trial within previous 2 month include modification physical and/or diet . Participant know allergy sensitivity placebo ( maltodextrin ) active ingredient ( Rhodiola & Rhaptonicum ) Participant consume 8 cup ( 1 cup = 6 oz ) coffee per day regular basis Participant consume 3 alcoholic drink per day . Participant use recreational drug daily . Previous physical symptom cause physician recommend refrain exercise .
